title: Environmental issues vs.economic growth in China

content.prompt: Which of the following is true of environmental policies in China?

choices.label: They are considered to be local issues primarily addressed at the village level.
They are difficult to implement because they often challenge or constrain economic growth.
They are mostly ineffective because of the decentralization of state power after Maoâ€™s death.
They are nonexistent because the government does not recognize that there are any environmental problems.

unit.text: 5: Political and Economic Changes and Development

skill.text: Skill 1.E: Explain how political systems, principles, institutions, processes, policies, and behaviors apply in a course country.
